article_title: See Behind-the-Scenes Photos From Chris Cuomo in Eastern Ukraine – New Day
article_text:
CNN's Chris Cuomo and his team are reporting on the ground in the embattled region of eastern Ukraine in the wake of the downing of Malaysia Airlines Flight 17 last Thursday.

For the latest updates and images of the MH17 crash site, follow Chris, his producer and videographer in Ukraine.

You can also see Chris' Facebook album for more images from his reporting.

For the latest updates and images of the MH17 crash site, follow Chris, his producer and videographer in Ukraine.
CNN's Chris Cuomo and his team are reporting on the ground in the embattled region of eastern Ukraine in the wake of the downing of Malaysia Airlines Flight 17 last Thursday.
You can also see Chris' Facebook album for more images from his reporting.
